item.title: Readings shared December 1, 2024
item.dc:creator: José A. Alonso
item.description:
The readings shared in Bluesky on 1 December 2024 are

  • Readings shared December 1, 2024. #ITP #IsabelleHOL #Math
  • Proofs of "If uₙ tends to a y vₙ tends to b, then uₙvₙ tends to ab" in Lean4. #ITP #Lean4 #Math #Calculemus
  • Lean: First steps (15 - Zero product). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Lean: First steps (16 - Writing our own lemma). ~ Tariq Rashid (@rzeta0@mastodon.social). #ITP #Lean4 #Math
  • Category theory in programming. ~ Noah Ma. #CategoryTheory #Math #Racket #FunctionalProgramming
